sn38.15:4.3: “Pañcime, āvuso, upādānakkhandhā sakkāyo vutto bhagavatā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38.15:4.5: Ime kho, āvuso, pañcupādānakkhandhā sakkāyo vutto bhagavatā”ti.
sn38.15:4.6: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.15:4.7: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāyā”ti.
sn38.15:4.8: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.15:4.9: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38.15:4.12: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāyā”ti.
sn38.15:4.13: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāya.
